title: Dmytro Fastov
text:
Dmytro Fastov (; born 25 July 1997) is a Ukrainian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who plays for <a href="MFC%20Mykolaiv">MFC Mykolaiv</a>.
Career.
Fastov is a product of FC Dynamo Kyiv Youth Sportive School.
From summer 2013, after graduation of the youth sportive school, he played in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League%20Reserves">Ukrainian Premier League Reserves</a> for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Kyiv%20reserves">FC Dynamo Kyiv reserves</a> and in the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a> for <a href="FC%20Dynamo-2%20Kyiv">FC Dynamo-2 Kyiv</a>. After the dissolution of FC Dynamo-2 he was signed by another <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a> team – <a href="FC%20Inhulets%20Petrove">Inhulets Petrove</a> in March 2017. In July 2017 he was signed by the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> debutant <a href="NK%20Veres%20Rivne">Veres Rivne</a>.
On 28 September 2018, he signed with <a href="Campeonato%20de%20Portugal%20%28league%29">Campeonato de Portugal</a> club <a href="S.C.%20Ideal">S.C. Ideal</a>.
